title: R-Debater: Retrieval-Augmented Debate Generation through Argumentative Memory
dimension: Adaptation to Rapidly Evolving AI Threat Landscape
summary: We present R-Debater, an agentic framework for generating multi-turn debates built on argumentative memory. Grounded in rhetoric and memory studies, the system views debate as a process of recalling and adapting prior arguments to maintain stance consistency, respond to opponents, and support claims
